body: Uncommon Sense re-posts a report of the arrest and alleged beating of the mother of the late prisoner of conscience, Orlando Zapata Tamayo, saying: "Wednesday...is [the] one-year anniversary of [his] death...already, Cuban police — spooked by the calendar and the possible spread of "Egyptian flu" — have launched a new wave of repression, in order to prevent something it won't be able to control because of the anniversary."
original_body: Uncommon Sense re-posts a report of the arrest and alleged beating of the mother of the late prisoner of conscience, Orlando Zapata Tamayo, saying: "Wednesday...is [the] one-year anniversary of [his] death...already, Cuban police — spooked by the calendar and the possible spread of "Egyptian flu" — have launched a new wave of repression, in order to prevent something it won't be able to control because of the anniversary."
title: Cuba: Reina Luisa Tamayo Arrested

sentence: Uncommon Sense re-posts a report of the arrest and alleged beating of the mother of the late prisoner of conscience, Orlando Zapata Tamayo, saying: "Wednesday...is [the] one-year anniversary of [his] death...already, Cuban police — spooked by the calendar and the possible spread of "Egyptian flu" — have launched a new wave of repression, in order to prevent something it won't be able to control because of the anniversary."
